data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.value: Welcome to the Xbox Full Screen Experience Tool!

data.name: ErrorCheckBuild
data.value: Checking Windows build failed with an unexpected error: {0}

data.name: ErrorReadRegistry
data.value: Error: Failed to read or parse current OS build information (CurrentBuild or UBR) from the registry.

data.name: ErrorBuildTooLow
data.value: Error: Your Windows build ({0}) is too low.

data.name: RequiredBuild
data.value: This tool requires build {0} or higher.

data.name: StatusNeedsFix
data.value: Status: Needs fix (Screen dimensions task not set up correctly)

data.name: ErrorCheckStatus
data.value: An error occurred while checking status: {0}

data.name: LogStatusCheck
data.value: Status Check -> ViVe Features: {0}, Registry: {1}, Task Required: {2}, Task Exists: {3}

data.name: LogErrorReadingScreenSize
data.value: Failed to read screen dimensions, unable to determine if a scheduled task is needed.

data.name: LogScreenSizeUndefined
data.value: Undefined screen dimensions (0x0mm) detected, creating startup task...

data.name: LogScreenSizeTooLarge
data.value: Screen size ({0:F2}") is larger than the {1}" threshold, creating startup task...

data.name: LogTaskNotNeeded
data.value: Screen size ({0:F2}") is within the {1}" range, no task needed.

data.name: LogErrorReadingScreenSizeEnable
data.value: Failed to read screen dimensions, skipping this step.

data.name: LogRegistryBackupSuccess
data.value: Backed up original DeviceForm value ({0}) to {1}.

data.name: LogRegistryBackupMarkedForDelete
data.value: Original DeviceForm value not found, created restore marker.

data.name: PromptRestartMessage
data.value: The settings have been applied successfully. Your computer must be restarted for the changes to take effect.

data.name: MessageBoxRestartFailed
data.value: Could not automatically restart. Please restart your computer manually.

data.name: LogUserRestartLater
data.value: User chose to restart later. No further actions can be performed until restart.

data.name: HandleExceptionMessage
LogErrorAdminRights
data.value: Please ensure this program is run with [Administrator Privileges].

data.name: LogFeaturesDisabledSuccess
data.value: Features successfully set to disabled state.

data.name: LogCheckingRegistryRestore
data.value: Checking if DeviceForm registry value needs to be restored...

data.name: LogBackupFound
data.value: Backup file found, proceeding with restore.

data.name: LogRegistryValueRemoved
data.value: Removed registry value '{0}' based on backup marker.

data.name: LogRegistryBackupInvalid
data.value: Backup file content is invalid. Safely removing registry value '{0}'.

data.name: LogNoBackupFound
data.value: No backup file found, indicating this tool has not modified the registry. No restore needed.

data.name: TaskSchedulerManagerErrorFindFile
data.value: Necessary file not found: {0}. Please ensure PhysPanelCS.exe is in the same directory as the main program.

data.name: TaskSchedulerManagerErrorDirectoryNotFound
data.value: Could not get the application's installation directory.

data.name: ErrorDriverFilesNotFound
data.value: Error: Driver files '{0}' or '{1}' not found.

data.name: WarningOemInfNotFound
data.value: Warning: Corresponding oem<number>.inf file not found, it may have already been removed.

data.name: grpPhysPanel_Text
data.value: Screen Dimensions Override Method (for non-handheld devices)

data.name: radPhysPanelCS_Text
data.value: PhysPanelCS (Task Scheduler Mode, Recommended default, No extra setup required)

data.name: radPhysPanelDrv_Text
data.value: PhysPanelDrv (Driver Mode, Alternative, Requires disabling Secure Boot && enabling Test Signing)

data.name: LogTestSigningDisabled
data.value: System Test Signing mode is not enabled. PhysPanelDrv option is disabled.

data.name: LogRemovingOldTask
data.value: Detected existing scheduled task, removing it to avoid conflicts...

data.name: LogRemovingOldDriver
data.value: Detected existing driver service, removing it to avoid conflicts...

data.name: ErrorWritingLogFile
data.value: Failed to write to the log file: {0}

data.name: LogStatusCheckSummary
data.value: Status Check: CoreEnabled={0} (ViVeFeatures={1}, Registry={2}), ScreenOverrideRequired={3}, OverridePresent={4} (CS={5}, Drv={6}), TestSigning={7}

data.name: StatusDriverErrorNeedsDisable
data.value: Driver Mode Error: Please Disable to Restore

data.name: LogDriverInstallCancelled
data.value: Driver installation was cancelled by the user or failed. The operation has been aborted.

data.name: LogErrorDriverRemoveFailedDuringSwitch
data.value: Failed to remove the existing driver while switching modes, but will proceed with setting up the new mode.

data.name: LogErrorDriverRemoveFailedGeneral
data.value: Failed to remove the driver. Manual cleanup may be required.

data.name: LogRollbackComplete
data.value: Rollback complete. No changes were made to the system.

data.name: LogErrorDriverInstallCancelled
data.value: Driver installation failed or was cancelled by the user. (Exit code: {0})

data.name: LogLargeScreenForceCS
data.value: Detected a screen size larger than 9.5 inches. To ensure compatibility, the override mode has been restricted to 'Task Scheduler (CS)' mode.

data.name: chkStartKeyboardOnLogon_Text
data.value: Start gamepad keyboard on logon and auto-hide to background

data.name: LogCreatingKeyboardTask
data.value: Creating scheduled task to start gamepad keyboard on logon...

data.name: LogDeletingKeyboardTask
data.value: Deleting scheduled task for starting gamepad keyboard on logon...

data.name: ErrorKeyboardTask
data.value: Failed to modify the gamepad keyboard startup task. Error: {0}

data.name: TooltipTouchEnabled
data.value: Your system has native touch support. Windows will manage the gamepad keyboard display automatically.

data.name: TooltipTouchDisabled
data.value: No touch support detected on your system. You can enable this to automatically launch the gamepad keyboard on logon for a controller-first experience.

data.name: ShutdownReasonEnable
data.value: Xbox Full Screen Experience Tool is restarting the computer to complete the configuration.

data.name: ShutdownReasonUninstall
data.value: Xbox Full Screen Experience Tool needs to reboot to complete uninstallation.

data.name: UpdateWindowsPrompt
data.value: Please run Windows Update to update your system to the latest version and try again.

data.name: LogArchNotSupported
data.value: Current CPU architecture (ARM64) does not support Driver Mode.

data.value: Status Check: Core={0}, Native={1}, Registry={2}, ScreenOverrideRequired={3}, CS={4}, Drv={5}, ScreenSize={6:F2}", TestSigning={7}

data.name: LogNativeSupportDetected
data.value: Detected build 26220.7271+, applying native support configuration. (Size: {0:F2}", Override: {1})

data.name: LogNonHandheldDetected
data.value: Non-handheld environment detected: Creating Registry maintenance task...

data.name: LogHandheldDetected
data.value: Handheld device detected: No maintenance task required.

data.value: Failed to archive old log file: {0}

data.name: btnCheckUpdates_Text
data.value: Check MS Store for Xbox Updates

data.name: MsgOpenSettingsManual
data.value: Unable to open Windows Settings. Please manually go to [Start > Settings > Gaming > Full Screen Experience].
